channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Word Balloon
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Word Balloon

item.title: CVE-2023-5884|2024-08-02T08:14:24.267Z -- unknown -- word%20balloon
item.description: The Word Balloon WordPress plugin before 4.20.3 does not protect some of its actions against CSRF attacks, allowing an unauthenticated attacker to trick a logged in user to delete arbitrary avatars by clicking a link.
